00036 namespace tld
00037 {
00038 
00039 template <class T1, class T2>
00040 void tldConvertBB(T1 *src, T2 *dest)
00041 {
00042     dest[0] = src[0];
00043     dest[1] = src[1];
00044     dest[2] = src[2];
00045     dest[3] = src[3];
00046 }
00047 
00048 template <class T>
00049 void tldCopyBB(T *src, T *dest)
00050 {
00051     tldConvertBB<T, T>(src, dest);
00052 }
00053 
00054 template <class T>
00055 void tldCopyBoundaryToArray(T x, T y, T width, T height, T *array)
00056 {
00057     array[0] = x;
00058     array[1] = y;
00059     array[2] = width;
00060     array[3] = height;
00061 }
00062 
00063 template <class T>
00064 void tldExtractDimsFromArray(T *boundary, T *x, T *y, T *width, T *height)
00065 {
00066     *x = boundary[0];
00067     *y = boundary[1];
00068     *width = boundary[2];
00069     *height = boundary[3];
00070 }
00071 
00072 template <class T>
00073 void tldRectToArray(cv::Rect rect, T *boundary)
00074 {
00075     boundary[0] = rect.x;
00076     boundary[1] = rect.y;
00077     boundary[2] = rect.width;
00078     boundary[3] = rect.height;
00079 }
00080 
00081 template <class T>
00082 cv::Rect tldArrayToRect(T *boundary)
00083 {
00084     cv::Rect rect;
00085     rect.x = boundary[0];
00086     rect.y = boundary[1];
00087     rect.width = boundary[2];
00088     rect.height = boundary[3];
00089 
00090     return rect;
00091 }
